form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Petition to Classify Status of Alien for Issuance of Immigrant Grant Visa, Form 1-130

full_text: Screened by NARA, 5/5/2023 Form approved Budget Bureau No. 4) PETITION TO Date filed Fee stamp CLASSIFY STATUS OF ALIEN \TIVE FOR ISSUAN OF IMMI- HERMOSILLO, MEXICO GRANT VISA 3-29-92 JUL 5 1972 TO THE SECRETARY OF STATE: The 3-29-12 CONSULATE GENERAL OF THE petition was filed on Remarksted STATES OF AMERICA The petition is approved for status under section: APPROVED SPOUSE, 201 (b) CHILD 203 (a) (2) DATE OF 6-26-72 ACTION 201 (b) PARENT 203 (a) ( (4) DD 203 (a) (1) 203 (a) (5) DISTRICT THC (PETITIONER IS NOT TO WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE) 1. Petition is hereby made to classify the status of the alien beneficiary for issuance of an immigrant visa as: (Check one) The spouse, child (regardless of age), parent, brother, or sister of a United States citizen. The spouse or unmarried child (regardless of age) of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence. Block I. - Information About Alien Beneficiary 2. Name (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 3.DoNotWrite in This Space Relationship of beneficiary to petitioner MACIAS De VELASQUEZ *Angela- For Mother 5. Other names used; Married woman give maiden name 6. Is beneficiary related to you by adoption? ##### Angela Macia Hurtado no 9. Beneficiary's marital status: Seperated- 7. Place of birth (Country) 8. Has this beneficiary ever been in- the U.S.? SAMANIEGO FRANCISCA 264-1807 Yes No 13. McBride Los Angeles, California 16. If this petition is for your spouse or child, give the following: a. Date and place of your present marriage 3 NA: NOGALES ARIZONA b. Number of your prior marriages C. Number of prior marriages of spouse NONE ONE d. Last address at which you and your spouse resided together From To (Town or city) (State or Province) (Country) (Apt. No.) (Number and street) (Month) (Year) (Month) (Year) LOS ANGELES CALIFORNIA U A--1011 so MCBRIDE, 7/62 6/1965 17. If this petition is for a child, (a). Is the child married? (b) Is the child your adopted child? If so, give the names, dates, and places of birth of all other children adopted by you. If none, so state 18. If this petition is for a brother or sister, are both your parents the same as the alien's parents? If not, submit a separate statement giving full details as to parentage, dates of marriage of parents, and the number of previous marriages of each parent. 19. If separate petitions are also being submitted for other relatives, give names of each and relationship to petitioner 20. Have you ever filed a petition for this alien before? no If so, give place and date of filing and result: Form I-130 (Rev. 11-1-70) Y UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE - Immigration and Naturalization Service
